channel.title: CVE Feed for Honeywell -- OneWireless
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Honeywell -- OneWireless

item.title: CVE-2022-4240|2024-08-03T01:34:49.828Z -- honeywell -- onewireless
item.description: Missing Authentication for Critical Function vulnerability in Honeywell OneWireless allows Authentication Bypass. This issue affects OneWireless version 322.1

item.title: CVE-2022-43485|2024-08-03T13:32:58.741Z -- honeywell -- onewireless
item.description: Use of Insufficiently Random Values in Honeywell OneWireless. This vulnerability may allow attacker to manipulate claims in client's JWT token. This issue affects OneWireless version 322.1

item.title: CVE-2022-46361|2024-08-03T14:31:46.378Z -- honeywell -- onewireless
item.description: An attacker having physical access to WDM can plug USB device to gain access and execute unwanted commands. A malicious user could enter a system command along with a backup configuration, which could result in the execution of unwanted commands. This issue affects OneWireless all versions up to 322.1 and fixed in version 322.2.
